content: साकूत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Having meaning, significant, meaning; साकूतस्मितं <ls>Gīt. 2</ls>; साकूतं वचनं &c. {@--2@} Intentional. {@--3@} Amorous, wanton. --तं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Meaningly, significantly; as in साकूतं मां निर्वर्ण्य. {@--2@} Amorously. {@--3@} Feelingly, pathetically. {@--4@} Attentively.
